verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> in <WG1909> the right hand <WG1188> of him that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the throne <WG2362> a book <WG975> written <WG1125> inside <WG2081> and <WG2532> on the backside <WG3693>, sealed <WG2696> with seven <WG2033> seals <WG4973>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> a strong <WG2478> angel <WG32> proclaiming <WG2784> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, Who <WG5101> is <WG2076> worthy <WG514> to open <WG455> the book <WG975>, and <WG2532> to loose <WG3089> the seals <WG4973> there <WG846>?

And <WG2532> no man <WG3762> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, nor <WG3761> in <WG1909> earth <WG1093>, neither <WG3761> under <WG5270> the earth <WG1093>, was able <WG1410> to open <WG455> the book <WG975>, neither <WG3761> to look <WG991> on it <WG846>.

And <WG2532> I <WG1473> wept <WG2799> much <WG4183>, because <WG3754> no man <WG3762> was found <WG2147> worthy <WG514> to open <WG455> and <WG2532> to read <WG314> the book <WG975>, neither <WG3777> to look <WG991> on it <WG846>.

And <WG2532> one <WG1520> of <WG1537> the elders <WG4245> said <WG3004> to me <WG3427>, Weep <WG2799> not <WG3361>: behold <WG2400>, the Lion <WG3023> <WG99999> of <WG1537> the tribe <WG5443> of Judah <WG2448>, the Root <WG4491> of David <WG1138>, has prevailed <WG3528> to open <WG455> the book <WG975>, and <WG2532> to loose <WG3089> the seven <WG2033> seals <WG4973> there <WG846>.

And <WG2532> I looked <WG1492>, and <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the throne <WG2362> and <WG2532> of the four <WG5064> creatures <WG2226>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> the midst <WG3319> of the elders <WG4245>, stood <WG2476> a Lamb <WG721> as <WG5613> it had been slain <WG4969>, having <WG2192> seven <WG2033> horns <WG2768> and <WG2532> seven <WG2033> eyes <WG3788>, which <WG3739> are <WG1526> the seven <WG2033> Spirits <WG4151> of God <WG2316> sent forth <WG649> into <WG1519> all <WG3956> the earth <WG1093>.
And <WG2532> he came <WG2064> and <WG2532> took <WG2983> the book <WG975> out of <WG1537> the right hand <WG1188> of him that sat <WG2521> upon <WG1909> the throne <WG2362>.

And <WG2532> when <WG3753> he had taken <WG2983> the book <WG975>, the four <WG5064> creatures <WG2226> and <WG2532> four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245> fell down <WG4098> before <WG1799> the Lamb <WG721>, having <WG2192> every <WG1538> one of them harps <WG2788>, and <WG2532> golden <WG5552> vials <WG5357> full <WG1073> of odors <WG2368>, which <WG3739> are <WG1526> the prayers <WG4335> of saints <WG40>.

And <WG2532> they sang <WG103> a new <WG2537> song <WG5603>, saying <WG3004>, You are <WG1488> worthy <WG514> to take <WG2983> the book <WG975>, and <WG2532> to open <WG455> the seals <WG4973> there <WG846>: for <WG3754> you were slain <WG4969>, and <WG2532> have redeemed <WG59> us <WG2248> to God <WG2316> by <WG1722> your <WG4675> blood <WG129> out <WG1537> of every <WG3956> relatives <WG5443>, and <WG2532> tongue <WG1100>, and <WG2532> people <WG2992>, and <WG2532> nation <WG1484>;
And <WG2532> have made <WG4160> us <WG2248> to our <WG2257> God <WG2316> kings <WG935> and <WG2532> priests <WG2409>: and <WG2532> we shall reign <WG936> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> I looked <WG1492>, and <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the voice <WG5456> of many <WG4183> angels <WG32> round about <WG2943> the throne <WG2362> and <WG2532> the creatures <WG2226> and <WG2532> the elders <WG4245>: and <WG2532> the number <WG706> of them <WG846> was <WG2258> ten thousand <WG3461> times ten thousand <WG3461>, and <WG2532> thousands <WG5505> of thousands <WG5505>;

Saying <WG3004> with a loud <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, Worthy <WG514> is <WG2076> the Lamb <WG721> that was slain <WG4969> to receive <WG2983> power <WG1411>, and <WG2532> riches <WG4149>, and <WG2532> wisdom <WG4678>, and <WG2532> strength <WG2479>, and <WG2532> honor <WG5092>, and <WG2532> glory <WG1391>, and <WG2532> blessing <WG2129>.

And <WG2532> every <WG3956> creature <WG2938> which <WG3739> is <WG2076> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, and <WG2532> on <WG1722> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> under <WG5270> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> such as <WG3739> are <WG2076> in <WG1909> the sea <WG2281>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> that are in <WG1722> them <WG846>, heard I <WG191> saying <WG3004>, Blessing <WG2129>, and <WG2532> honor <WG5092>, and <WG2532> glory <WG1391>, and <WG2532> power <WG2904>, be to him that sits <WG2521> upon <WG1909> the throne <WG2362>, and <WG2532> to the Lamb <WG721> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>.

And <WG2532> the four <WG5064> creatures <WG2226> said <WG3004>, Amen <WG281>. And <WG2532> the four <WG5064> and twenty <WG1501> elders <WG4245> fell down <WG4098> and <WG2532> worshiped <WG4352> him that lives <WG2198> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>.
